param.name: name
param.label: Display Name
param.description: If not specified then default section name will be used

param.name: iphoneurl
param.label: Iphone URL
param.description: Add Webview or Json URL here. Leave Blank to not show this menu on Device.

param.name: iphoneurlview
param.label: Iphone Method
param.description: Add Webview or Json URL here. Use 'Use Global' to not show this menu on Device.

param.name: andurl
param.label: Android URL
param.description: Add Webview or Json URL here. Leave Blank to not show this menu on Device.

param.name: androidurlview
param.label: Android Method
param.description: Add Webview or Json URL here. Use 'Use Global' to not show this menu on Device.

param.name: mobilemenu_image
param.label: Select image
param.description: If not specified then default section icon will be used
